name: claude-mermaid-collab
description: Browser UI for mermaid-collab with AI-powered interactions and backend server

scripts.start: bun run build && bun run src/server.ts
scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,ui -c blue,green "bun run src/server.ts" "cd ui && bun run dev"
scripts.version:sync: bun -e "const fs = require('fs'); const v = require('./package.json').version; const p = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('.claude-plugin/plugin.json')); p.version = v; fs.writeFileSync('.claude-plugin/plugin.json', JSON.stringify(p, null, 2) + '\n'); const m = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('.claude-plugin/marketplace.json')); m.plugins[0].version = v; fs.writeFileSync('.claude-plugin/marketplace.json', JSON.stringify(m, null, 2) + '\n'); let mcp = fs.readFileSync('src/mcp/server.ts', 'utf-8'); mcp = mcp.replace(/const SERVER_VERSION = '[^']+';/, \`const SERVER_VERSION = '\${v}';\`); fs.writeFileSync('src/mcp/server.ts', mcp);"
scripts.version: npm run version:sync && git add .claude-plugin/plugin.json .claude-plugin/marketplace.json src/mcp/server.ts
